data.title: Prema (1989)
data.meta_description: Pruthvi is an orphan who tries hard to become a great singer. One day he comes across a beautiful, naughty young girl Maggi , and they both fall in love. When he approaches Maggi's parents to ask her hand in marriage, his criminal background comes into the picture.
data.text:
Reversed Sleeping Beauty.

Venky mama and Revathi are beautiful in this movie, their chemistry is full of youthful love, one that is given enough time to enjoy and understand their love with multiple scenes, little details and callbacks. Venky’s loneliness and anger are nicely shown and Revathi’s character is full of hope and life. SPB is also brilliant, not only as a singer but as an actor too. Kalpana as Geetha was also great and there were moments where I felt Prudhvi and Geetha could’ve been together too. Manjula Vijayakumar’s arrogance and egoistic portrayal of Stella was also amazing, except for the climax where it felt a little unnatural.

I love that they let each important moment breathe in this…
